## Longhands.Computed type

Extract the computed type a named property.

[https://drafts.csswg.org/css-cascade/\#computed](https://drafts.csswg.org/css-cascade/#computed)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type Computed<N extends Name> = Property[N] extends Longhand<infer S, infer C> ? C : never;
```
